column4: Again, 3 monkey story. Everybody is quoting everybody but not one bloody person has done it!
WPA2 was broken with rainbow tables and GPGPU. If you don't have a common ESSID that method doesn't work and you're fine.
Rainbow tables, hashes, we tried it all. Big freaking waste of time WPA.
If you'd like to join #ubuntu-offtopic we can discuss it at length
